UNGP.d_menu:
Welcome to the main menu of UNGP. What do you need to do? 
Check savepoint:  View your savepoint, and you can choose to inherit it or not.
Record savepoint: Save your current game status and overwrite your last savepoint.
UNGP.d_helpInfo:
This mod enables multi-gamecycle feature. 
After reaching maxlevel, you can record a savepoint(recording you save), which would save your blueprints(except industry blueprint), credits and current gamecycle number. 
 You can record ONCE for each save, and you can have three savepoint for all of your saves. 
After a new campaign game, you have 1 day to check your savepoint, and decide whether to inherit you previous gamecycle or not. If you choose inheriting, you can get part of the resources of your previous gamecycle and (gamecycle number - 1) skillpoints. Note that savepoint will not disappear after inheriting, you could inherit it in another save, and only by reaching maxlevel can you record savepoint again.(You could check the setting file) 

Specialist mode can be enabled at any gamecycle to make you a more customized game!
UNGP.c_message: You have loaded the UNGP Mod. Would you like to check and inherit the savepoint immediately? (you can also use left CTRL +P to call out the UNGP menu)
